1.title: Baby Shark
1.plot: Baby shark, doo, doo, doo, doo, doo, doo. Baby shark!

2.title: Baby Shark Dance
2.plot: Come join us and dance with the Baby Shark family!

3.title: Halloween Shark
3.plot: Baby shark, doo doo doo doo doo doo. Baby shark. BOO! Halloween is more spooky and fun with Baby Shark.

4.title: Christmas Sharks
4.plot: Santa Claus, doo doo doo doo doo. Santa Claus is visiting the Baby Shark Family with a lot of gifts!

5.title: Valentine's Day Sharks
5.plot: Valentine's Day, doo doo doo doo doo doo. Share your love with your friends and family on Valentine's Day.

6.title: Pirate Baby Shark
6.plot: Pirate Baby Shark, Hammerhead Shark, Saw Shark, and Whale Shark are celebrating Halloween.

7.title: Be Happy With Baby Shark
7.plot: Baby Shark, Baby turtle, Baby sea horse, and Baby whale are happy together.

8.title: Baby Shark 1.5x
8.plot: Baby shark, doo, doo, doo, doo, doo, doo. Baby shark! Listen to the faster version of Baby Shark.

9.title: Orchestra Sharks
9.plot: Welcome to the orchestra concert of Baby Shark Family! Each family member will be playing the instrument.

10.title: Baby Shark Dance Remix
10.plot: Learn how to dance to Baby Shark Remix!

11.title: Disco Sharks
11.plot: Just sharks? Oh, no! No! Dancing sharks? Oh, yes! Yes! Scary sharks? Oh, no, no, no! Grooving sharks? Oh, yes! Yes, we are!

12.title: Good Night Baby Shark
12.plot: Winkum winkum, doo doo doo doo doo. Good night!

13.title: Baby Shark Music Box
13.plot: It's time to go to bed. Enjoy the soothing Baby Shark lullaby.

imdb.plot outline: Enjoy a collection of "Baby Shark" songs. Meet Pinkfong's fun, educational videos that captured the hearts of millions of children around the world. Enjoy hundreds of kids' favorite songs and stories created by Pinkfong, the official creator of global hit Baby Shark behind #BabySharkChallenge.
imdb.title: Pinkfong! Baby Shark Special
plot: Enjoy a collection of "Baby Shark" songs. Meet Pinkfong's fun, educational videos that captured the hearts of millions of children around the world. Enjoy hundreds of kids' favorite songs and stories created by Pinkfong, the official creator of global hit Baby Shark behind #BabySharkChallenge.

Come join Baby Shark Family and sing with them! Meet Pinkfong's fun, educational videos that captured the hearts of millions of children around the world. Enjoy hundreds of kids' favorite songs and stories created by Pinkfong, the official creator of global hit Baby Shark behind #BabySharkChallenge.
